metadata.title: CVE-2020-19858 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Platinum Upnp SDK through 1.2.0 has a directory traversal vulnerability.The attack could remote attack victim by sendinghttp://ip:port/../privacy.avi URL to compromise a victim's privacy.

criterions.comment: kodi package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
digikam package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
